definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Enhance your personal videos by adding professional looking fader effects.
sentences.chinese: 提高你的個人影片新增專業尋找推子影響。

sentences.english: New are the controller functions and sliders.
sentences.chinese: 新的功能是主控功能和推子。

sentences.english: MicroWarpdrives and Afterburners will no longer list a 'Shield HP Bonus' attribute.
sentences.chinese: 微曲和普通推子將不再顯示‘能量護盾加成’屬性。

sentences.english: Fader is also a map of.
Channel faders, bus faders, and a crossfader give you smooth control of key values.
sentences.chinese: 通道推子，巴士推子，和交叉給你的鍵值平穩控制。

sentences.english: Channel faders, bus faders, and a crossfader give you smooth control of key values.
sentences.chinese: 通道推子，巴士推子，和交叉給你的鍵值平穩控制。

sentences.english: This changes the pre - amplification of the signal before it goes to the volume fader .
sentences.chinese: 這改變了前放大的信號之前，這就是音量推子。

definition: see 直髮器|直发器[zhi2 fa4 qi4]
